{{problem.description}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from '../services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-problems-list', templateUrl: './problems-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./problems-list.component.css'] }) export class ProblemsListComponent implements OnInit { problems!:any; questions_display_type: string = "None"; constructor(public service:DataService) { this.service.getAllProblems().subscribe( (res:any)=>{ this.problems = res; console.log("RESPONSE SUCCESSFULLY RECEIVED") this.service.displayLogin = !this.service.displayLogin; if(this.service.displayLogin == false){ this.questions_display_type = "block"; }else{ this.questions_display_type= "None"; } } ) } ngOnInit(): void { } async creatorDetails(problem_id:string){ const {creator,problems} = await this.service.getProfileByProblemId(problem_id); // if(!creator){ // var username= prompt('You are not logged in:\n Please Enter User name:') // var password = prompt('Please enter your password'); // this.service.login({email:username, password}) // this.creatorDetails(problem_id) // } alert("creator:"+ creator); } }
